name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Miners in Africa have found a massive 910 carat diamond worth tens of millions of dollars. The diamond will go to either a museum or to Beyoncé the next time Jay-Z cheats on her.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: President Trump’s doctor predicted that the president will live a long life. As a result, the doctor is now treating Melania Trump for depression.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: President Trump had a physical today. After Trump’s exam, his doctor said he found “no cognitive or mental issues whatsoever.” But the doctor did say, “Keep in mind, I am a proctologist.”

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: The Mormon Church has picked a new leader and he’s 93 years old. Which is why they’re getting together on Friday to pick another new leader.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: President Trump broke with tradition and spent Martin Luther King Jr. Day playing golf instead of performing a community service. However, many people say that any time Donald Trump’s not in the White House, he’s performing a community service.
